meanings.definition: A large group of galaxies bound together by gravity.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study superclusters to learn more about the universe.
meanings.sent2: The superclusters in the night sky are mesmerizing to observe.
meanings.sent3: When the superclusters threw a party, even the black holes showed up!
meanings.sent4: The superclusters in the cosmos are like bustling cities of stars.
meanings.sent5: The superclusters' gravitational pull is so strong, it's like a cosmic magnet.

meanings.definition: A cluster of galaxies that are grouped together in a specific region of space.
meanings.sent1: The superclusters in this part of the universe are densely packed.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers have discovered new superclusters beyond our galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The superclusters decided to have a race to see who could reach the edge of space first!
meanings.sent4: In the vast expanse of space, the superclusters stand out like islands in a sea of stars.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the superclusters twinkling in the night sky is truly breathtaking.
